body: It would be nice to allow constructing `CallsiteDescriptor`s from an `int`, since it's usually not the case that we allow variable number of outputs
body_html: It would be nice to allow constructing CallsiteDescriptors from an int, since it's usually not the case that we allow variable number of outputs
body_text: It would be nice to allow constructing CallsiteDescriptors from an int, since it's usually not the case that we allow variable number of outputs
